name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Shorts to Normal Video Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically Converts YouTube Shorts to Regular Video User Interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically converts YouTube Shorts interface to regular YouTube video UI.

Update: version 1.3
- The previous extension of the same name has been taken down by the Chrome Web Store. Please install this version for updates and more info.
- Changed logo
- Minor code clean-up

Update: version 1.2
- Fixed double-click issue when navigating back from Shorts page.
- Seamless navigation to previous page without unnecessary redirection.
- Minor code clean-up
